text: This is an example sentence.
The quick brown fox jumps over the lazy dog.
translated: Люди, живущие в стеклянных домах, не должны бросать камни.

text: A journey of a thousand miles begins with a single step.
To be or not to be, that is the question.
translated: Быть или не быть – вот в чем вопрос.

text: All roads lead to Rome.
Knowledge is power.
translated: Нельзя судить о книге по ее обложке.

text: Rome wasn't built in a day.
When in Rome, do as the Romans do.
translated: Можно привести лошадь к воде, но нельзя заставить ее пить.

text: Where there's a will, there's a way.
You can't judge a book by its cover.
Practice makes perfect.
translated: Хорошие вещи приходят к тем, кто ждет.

text: Actions speak louder than words.
translated: Твоя догадка так же хороша, как моя.

text: Beauty is in the eye of the beholder.
Don't put all your eggs in one basket.
Every cloud has a silver lining.
Good things come to those who wait.
Honesty is the best policy.
If at first you don't succeed, try again.
Laughter is the best medicine.
Look before you leap.
Money doesn't grow on trees.
Necessity is the mother of invention.
No pain, no gain.
Old habits die hard.
Opportunity knocks but once.
translated: Там, где дым, там и огонь.

text: Patience is a virtue.
People who live in glass houses shouldn't throw stones.
translated: Жизнь — это то, что происходит, когда вы заняты другими делами.

text: Prevention is better than cure.
Rome wasn't built in a day.
Slow and steady wins the race.
Time flies when you're having fun.
Two heads are better than one.
translated: Рим не был построен за один день.

text: Variety is the spice of life.
translated: Яблоко не падает далеко от дерева.

text: Waste not, want not.
translated: Трава всегда зеленее с другой стороны.

text: What goes around comes around.
When the going gets tough, the tough get going.
You can lead a horse to water, but you can't make it drink.
Absence makes the heart grow fonder.
All good things must come to an end.
translated: Мы едины, мы разделены, мы падаем.

text: Better late than never.
translated: Рим не был построен за один день.

text: Birds of a feather flock together.
Cleanliness is next to godliness.
Curiosity killed the cat.
Discretion is the better part of valor.
Early bird catches the worm.
Easy come, easy go.
Empty vessels make the most noise.
Familiarity breeds contempt.
translated: Если сначала у вас ничего не получится, попробуйте еще раз.

text: Fortune favors the bold.
Great minds think alike.
Half a loaf is better than none.
translated: Быстрая коричневая лиса прыгает через ленивую собаку.

text: Health is wealth.
Home is where the heart is.
Idle hands are the devil's workshop.
Ignorance is bliss.
It's always darkest before dawn.
translated: Рим не был построен за один день.

text: Jack of all trades, master of none.
Keep your friends close and your enemies closer.
Kill two birds with one stone.
Less is more.
Let sleeping dogs lie.
Life is what happens when you're busy making other plans.
Love conquers all.
Make hay while the sun shines.
translated: Позаботьтесь о пенни, и фунты позаботятся о себе.

text: Many hands make light work.
Misery loves company.
Never put off till tomorrow what you can do today.
Nothing ventured, nothing gained.
Out of sight, out of mind.
People who live in glass houses should not throw stones.
Practice makes perfect.
translated: Никогда не откладывайте на завтра то, что вы можете сделать сегодня.

text: Proceed cautiously.
Quality over quantity.
Rome wasn't built in a day.
Seeing is believing.
translated: Когда вы в Риме, делайте то же, что и римляне.

text: Silence is golden.
Still waters run deep.
translated: Не кладите все яйца в одну корзину.

text: Strike while the iron is hot.
translated: Ты не можешь съесть торт и съесть его тоже.

text: Take care of the pennies and the pounds will take care of themselves.
Talk is cheap.
translated: Ничего не рискнул, ничего не выиграл.

text: The apple doesn't fall far from the tree.
The early bird catches the worm.
The grass is always greener on the other side.
The pen is mightier than the sword.
translated: Джек всех профессий, мастер ни одной.

text: There’s no place like home.
Time heals all wounds.
Too many cooks spoil the broth.
Truth is stranger than fiction.
United we stand, divided we fall.
translated: Там, где есть завещание, есть способ.

text: Variety is the spice of life.
Well begun is half done.
translated: То, что происходит вокруг, происходит вокруг.

text: What's done cannot be undone.
translated: Держите своих друзей и врагов ближе.

text: When in doubt, leave it out.
Where there’s smoke, there’s fire.
With age comes wisdom.
translated: Ты поцарапаешь мне спину, я поцарапаю твою.

text: Work smarter, not harder.
You can't have your cake and eat it too.
You scratch my back, I'll scratch yours.
translated: Когда движение становится жестким, жесткое идет.

text: Your guess is as good as mine.
translated: Путешествие в тысячу миль начинается с одного шага.

text: Zero tolerance means zero mercy.
translated: Люди, живущие в стеклянных домах, не должны бросать камни.
